subject: Re: [junit] Some questions about JUnit 4
msgSnippet: ... If someone were to port the JUnit 3 runners forward, would you be interested in including them? I often find myself teaching or writing in situations where
messageBody:
Kent Beck wrote:

>> 5. The GUI test runners don't appear to be in Version4 CVS. Will they
>> return at some point?
>
> We don't have any plans to provide GUI test runners.
>

If someone were to port the JUnit 3 runners forward, would you be
interested in including them? I often find myself teaching or writing in
situations where I don't want to assume any particular IDE or the
presence of an IDE at all.

--
